channel.title: Visualization on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on My New Hugo Site

item.title: VR Data Mapper
item.description: VR Data Mapper At Bitcamp 2015 my team worked to find a way to best display open source data from the DC government using VR technology. This project allows a user to observe a map of Washington DC’s wards through an Oculus rift and display a number of geographically impacted datasets on the map. By using the Leap Motion, we were able to integrate hand gestures and sophisticated menus, simplifying complex operations and allowing users to focus on exploring the data before them.
